pageContext.claim: “I know that Voice of America is run in a terrible manner. Terrible. They're not the voice of America, they're the opposite of the voice of America.”
pageContext.analysis: VOA is highly regarded for its accurate and unbiased reporting. It is headed by Amanda Bennett, a former Philadelphia Inquirer editor. But Trump wants a propaganda vehicle, even though that is not supposed to be the role of the VOA's news side.
